body: <div id="common-detail" ng-if="vm.loadViewContent" class="page-layout simple right-sidenav" layout="row" style="height: 100%;">

<md-sidenav class="left-sidenav w-205" md-component-id="left-sidenav" md-is-locked-open="\$mdMedia('gt-md') && vm.leftNavPined " ng-include="'app/main/common/details/sidenavs/leftSideNav.html'" ms-sidenav-helper style="overflow:hidden;">
<div class="mr-25 font-size-18" layout="row" layout-align="start center" ng-if="vm.headerTitle">
<div ng-if="vm.loadViewContent" class="page-layout simple right-sidenav" layout="row" style="height:100%;">
<div class="mr-25 font-size-20 font-weight-900" layout="row" layout-align="start center">
<center>Your Content Here (ms-scroll with proper heght is given)</center>
<div class="b grey-200-bg" layout="row" layout-align="start center" style="height: 7%;">
<div class="b grey-200-bg" layout="row" layout-align="start center" style="height: 7%;">
<div class="msb-collapse-header blue-grey-50-bg mb-5 h-40 b cursor-pointer ml-10 mr-10" layout="row" ng-click="(clicked) ? clicked=false: clicked=true" layout-align="space-between center">
<div class="p-10 grey-700-fg font-size-16" layout="row" layout-align="space-between center">
<div class="msb-collapse-header blue-grey-50-bg mb-5 h-40 b cursor-pointer ml-10 mr-10" layout="row" ng-click="(clicked) ? clicked=false: clicked=true" layout-align="space-between center">
<div class="p-10 grey-700-fg font-size-16" layout="row" layout-align="space-between center">
<div class="msb-collapse-header grey-200-bg mb-10 h-40 b cursor-pointer ml-40 mr-40" layout="row" ng-click="(clicked) ? clicked=false: clicked=true" layout-align="space-between center">
<div class="p-10 grey-700-fg font-size-16" layout="row" layout-align="space-between center">
<div flex="" layout="column" layout-align="center center" class="md-padding" md-colors="{background: 'teal-400'}">
<div flex="" class="md-padding" layout="column" layout-align="center center" md-colors="{background: 'teal-400'}">
<div flex="" class="md-padding" layout="column" layout-align="center center" md-colors="{background: 'teal-400'}">
<div flex="" class="md-padding" layout="column" layout-align="center center" md-colors="{background: 'teal-400'}">
<div flex="" class="md-padding" layout="column" layout-align="center center" md-colors="{background: 'grey-50'}">
<div flex="" class="md-padding" layout="column" layout-align="center center" md-colors="{background: 'grey-50'}">
<div flex="" class="md-padding" layout="column" layout-align="center center" md-colors="{background: 'grey-50'}">
<div flex="" class="md-padding" layout="column" layout-align="center center" md-colors="{background: 'grey-50'}">

<div class="blue-grey-50-bg mb-5 h-40 b cursor-pointer ml-10 mr-10" layout="row" ng-click="(vm.selectedObj==obj.TECHDISER_ID) ? vm.selectedObj='' : vm.selectedObj=obj.TECHDISER_ID" layout-align="space-between center">
<div class="p-10 grey-700-fg font-size-16" layout="row" layout-align="space-between center">
<div class="br w-200" style="height: 100%; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);" layout="column">
<div class="blue-100-bg bb h-40" layout="column" layout-align="center start">
<div layout="row" class="msb-collapse-header cursor-pointer navigation-simple" style="width:100%" ng-click="(clicked) ?  clicked=false: clicked=true">
<div layout="row" class="msb-collapse-header cursor-pointer navigation-simple" style="width:100%" ng-click="(clicked) ?  clicked=false: clicked=true">

<md-button layout="row" ng-repeat="thirdObj in secondObj.thirdArray" class="h-40 item bb" style="width: 100%;" ng-click="vm.selectObj(thirdObj)" ng-class="{'blue-100-bg': vm.selectedObj == thirdObj}">
<div class="br w-200" style="height: 100%; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);" layout="column">
<div class="blue-100-bg bb h-40" layout="column" layout-align="center start">
<div layout="row" class="msb-collapse-header cursor-pointer navigation-simple" style="width:100%" ng-click="(clicked) ?  clicked=false: clicked=true">
<md-button layout="row" ng-repeat="secondObj in obj.secondArray" class="h-40 item bb" style="width: 100%;" ng-click="vm.selectObj(secondObj)" ng-class="{'blue-100-bg': vm.selectedObj == secondObj}">
<div class="blue-grey-100-bg bb h-40" layout="column" layout-align="center start">
<div layout="row" ng-repeat="obj in vm.infoMenuLevel1" class="cursor-pointer navigation-simple" style="width:100%">
<md-button class="h-45 item  bb" style="width:100%;background-color: rgb(255, 248, 235);" ng-click="vm.selectObj(obj)" ng-class="{'blue-100-bg': vm.selectedObj == obj}">
<div class="w-120 h-50 b grey-300-bg" layout="column" layout-align="center center">
<div ng-repeat="columnItem in vm.column" layout="column" layout-align="center center" class="w-200 bt bb br h-50 grey-300-bg">
<div class="w-120 h-50 bl bb br" layout="column" layout-align="center center">
<div ng-repeat="item in vm.matrixProduct" class="w-200 h-50 bb br" layout="row" layout-align="center center" ng-if="item.TECHDISER_ID==rowItem.TECHDISER_ID+columnItem.TECHDISER_ID">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bt bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bt bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bt bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bt bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bt bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bt bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-90  bl bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bt bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bt bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bt bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bt bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bt bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bt bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div layout="column" class="w-140 bb br" layout-align="center center">
<div class="msb-collapse-header cursor-pointer h-45 blue-grey-50-bg b mb-5" layout="row" layout-align="space-around">
<div ng-repeat="attribute in obj.childArray" layout="row" class="" layout-align="space-around">
{{attribute.field1}}
{{attribute.field2}}
{{attribute.field3}}
{{attribute.field4}}
{{attribute.field5}}
{{attribute.field6}}
<div ng-repeat="parentObj in vm.parentArray" class="p-10" layout="row" layout-wrap>
<div class="box-shadow p-15  mb-10 b white-bg" style="width: 270px;height: 240px;border-color: green;" layout="column" layout-align="space-between start">
<div class="box-shadow p-10 ml-10 mb-10 white-bg" style="width: 260px;height: 240px;" layout="column" layout-align="space-between start">
<div class="box-shadow p-15  mb-10 b white-bg" style="width: 270px;height: 240px;border-color: green;" layout="column" layout-align="space-between start">
<div class="box-shadow p-10 ml-10 mb-10 white-bg" style="width: 260px;height: 240px;" layout="column" layout-align="space-between start">
<div class="common-list-item" md-ink-ripple layout="row" ng-repeat="obj in vm.listItem">

<div ng-repeat="tab in vm.coinTabList" ng-click="vm.selectTab(tab)" class="cursor-pointer mb-5 msb-label-chip" style="background-color: rgb(224, 224, 224);" layout="row" ng-class="{'green-200-bg': vm.selectedTab == tab}">

mdSelect.body:
<md-select class="m-0 p-0 h-20"
  name="select" ng-model="data"
  ng-change="vm.updateData();" aria-label="Select">
  <md-option value="{{item.TECHDISER_ID}}"
    ng-repeat="item in vm.items"
    >{{item.title}}
  </md-option>
</md-select>
